name: CDiffInfectionTestsForCDiffToxinInStoolByCellCultureCytotoxicityNeutralizationMethod
title: C. diff infection (Tests for C diff Toxin in Stool by Cell Culture Cytotoxicity Neutralization Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of C diff in Stool by Cell Culture Cytotoxicity Neutralization Method),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: C diff),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
